name: Drum Castle
description: The royal castle of Drum Island, perched atop the tallest of the Drum Rockies. Previously ruled by Wapol, it is the site of the climactic battles of the Drum Island arc.

keyEvents.description: Chessmarimo created and battles Chopper inside the castle
keyEvents.significance: Site of Chopper's first major combat victory

keyEvents.description: Luffy plants Dr. Hiriluk's pirate flag with cherry blossoms atop the castle's tallest tower
keyEvents.significance: Transforms the castle into a memorial for Hiriluk's dreams and legacy

keyEvents.description: Wapol secretly infiltrates the castle while others are distracted by battles
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the final confrontation between Wapol and Luffy

notableFeatures: Tallest tower where Hiriluk's flag is planted
Former throne room of King Wapol

name: Bighorn
description: The main town of Drum Island where most of the island's citizens live. The town serves as the primary settlement after Wapol's exile.

keyEvents.description: Isshi-20 doctors arrive and plead with townspeople to let them save Dalton
keyEvents.significance: Location where the doctors reveal their redemption and change of heart

keyEvents.description: Isshi-20 successfully revive Dalton from near-death
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the medical expertise and newfound dedication of the doctors

keyEvents.description: Dalton insists on leaving to confront Wapol despite his injuries
keyEvents.significance: Shows the town's guardian refusing to rest while his people are in danger

name: Drum Rockies
climate: Winter Island - Extremely Cold and Snowy
description: The treacherous mountain range on Drum Island, featuring tall rocky peaks covered in snow. Drum Castle sits atop the tallest peak.

keyEvents.description: Zoro and Usopp transport recovering Dalton through the mountains toward the castle
keyEvents.significance: Shows the difficult terrain between the town and the castle
